name: The Penguin Prince
text: Once per turn, you can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; add 1 "Penguin" Spell/Trap card from your Deck to your hand. During the End Phase: Special Summon 1 "Penguin" monster from your GY in face-up or face-down defense position. You can only use this effect of "The Penguin Prince" once per turn. Once per Battle Phase, if this card battles an opponent’s monster: You can banish that monster then have 1 "Penguin" monster you control gain ATK equal to that banished monster’s until the end of this turn.
